briefdescription.para: A diagnostic is generated when a function is marked with NODISCARD and the function call appears as a potentially-evaluated discarded-value expression that is not explicitly cast to void.

detaileddescription.para: A diagnostic is generated when a function is marked with NODISCARD and the function call appears as a potentially-evaluated discarded-value expression that is not explicitly cast to void. int function() { return -1 };
